mapper.sql: select m.member_no, m.name, m.nickname, m.email, m.password, m.tel, m.photo, m.created_dt, m.active, m.status, cm.ceo_member_no ceo_no, cm.bossname bossname, cm.license_no license_no from member m join ceo_member cm on m.member_no=cm.member_no
mapper.select: select cm.ceo_member_no ceo_no, m.nickname, m.email, m.active from member m join ceo_member cm on m.member_no=cm.member_no where email=#{email} and password=password(#{password})
select cm.ceo_member_no ceo_no, m.name, m.email from member m join ceo_member cm on m.member_no=cm.member_no where m.name=#{value}
select cm.ceo_member_no ceo_no, m.email, m.nickname, m.name from member m join ceo_member cm on m.member_no=cm.member_no where m.email=#{value}
mapper.update: update member set name = #{ceoName} where member_no = (select member_no from ceo_member where ceo_member_no=#{ceoNo})
update member set nickname = #{ceoNickname} where member_no = (select member_no from ceo_member where ceo_member_no=#{ceoNo})
update member set photo = #{ceoPhoto} where member_no = (select member_no from ceo_member where ceo_member_no=#{ceoNo})
update member set tel = #{ceoTel} where member_no = (select member_no from ceo_member where ceo_member_no=#{ceoNo})
update member set email = #{ceoEmail} where member_no = (select member_no from ceo_member where ceo_member_no=#{ceoNo})
update member set password = password(#{ceoPassword}) where member_no = (select member_no from ceo_member where ceo_member_no=#{ceoNo})
update member set active = #{active} where member_no = (select member_no from ceo_member where ceo_member_no=#{ceoNo})
